Bolingbrook.Bolingbrook High School:
Bolingbrook High School or BHS is a public four-year high school located in Bolingbrook, Illinois, a western suburb of Chicago, Illinois, in the United States. Bolingbrook High School is the second high school in the Valley View Community Unit School District 365U.

Bolingbrook High School was recognized by U.S. News as one of the top 100 high schools in Illinois.


== History ==
The current campus was established in 2004, and is part of the Valley View Community Unit School District 365U, which also includes Romeoville High School.
